mapper.select: select * from announce a, company c where a.com_id = c.com_id and a.anno_code = #{a.anno_code}
select distinct c.comm_ctx from announce a inner join comm c on a.job_tag = c.sub_cat where main_cat = 001 and a.job_tag = #{job_tag}
select distinct c.comm_ctx from announce a inner join comm c on a.emp_type = c.sub_cat where main_cat = 071 and a.emp_type = #{emp_type}
select distinct c.comm_ctx from announce a inner join comm c on a.tech_tag1 = c.sub_cat where main_cat = 002 and a.tech_tag1 = #{tech_tag1}
select distinct c.comm_ctx from announce a inner join comm c on a.tech_tag2 = c.sub_cat where main_cat = 002 and a.tech_tag2 = #{tech_tag2}
select distinct c.comm_ctx from announce a inner join comm c on a.career = c.sub_cat where main_cat = 070 and a.career = #{career}
select distinct c.comm_ctx from company b inner join comm c on b.com_sec = c.sub_cat where main_cat = '050' and b.com_sec = #{com_sec}
mapper.delete: delete from scrap where anno_code = #{anno_code} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, a.* from (select user_id, res_title, res_date from resume where user_id = 'siasia54') a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
